input: Consider the following statements related to Article 368 of the Constitution: P. A Constitutional Amendment Bill can be passed at a joint session of Parliament in case of deadlock between the two Houses. Q. It is obligatory for the President of India to give his assent to a Constitutional Amendment Bill passed under Article 368. R. To amend 7th Schedule of the Constitution, ratification of more than half of the State legislature is essential. S. A proposal to amend the Constitution can only be introduced in the House of the People. Which of these are correct ?
